title: BONUS - The Myth of Balance
description:
I get this question a lot… how do you balance life, family, and work? We’re going to talk about what it means to balance (or not balance) all the relationships and things we have in our lives. I don’t see balance in Scripture… I see surrender and obedience. Let’s talk about this practically.

FREE DREAM GUIDE: www.jennieallen.com/dreamguide

FREE GOOYH BOOK CLUB KIT: jennieallen.com
